verbose_text: Specifically, individuals in the PS group exhibited higher BMI and percent body fat, primary insulin resistance, and a lipid profile consistent with the metabolic syndrome [XREF_BIBR]; altered immune function with a TH2 shift in the TH1 / TH2 balance; altered endocrine function, with an increased ACTH and reduced cortisol levels during pharmacological and psychological stimulation paradigms; accelerated cellular aging; and impaired prefrontal cortex (PFC)-related cognitive performance (impairments in working memory performance after hydrocortisone administration) [XREF_BIBR].
